page.title: 05The Present School
page.content: {Gretna Primary School}was completed in 1981 and is{semi open plan}.In 1985 the school roll stood at 222.There are nine teachers in the school,including the{head teacher}and visiting { {teachers}for physical education,music,art and remedial provision.Meals are cooked in school and served in the hall.There is a{ {caretaker}and{secretary}to help with the smooth running of the school. The school is well equipped inside and out.Each room is carpeted and there are wet areas between classes.The toilets are inside and are shared by pairs of classes.There are many boards in each classroom for display purposes.The school is centrally{ {heated}from{underfloor}.The playground has a grass area,climbing frames and concrete animals.
